actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to authorize and require the President of the United States to allocate asphalt and asphalt derivatives, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes and requires the President of the United States to allocate asphalt and asphalt derivatives at specified prices to achieve an equitable distribution pursuant to the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the emergency Petroleum Allocation Act of 1973 to authorize and require the President of the United States to allocate asphalt and asphalt derivatives, and for other purposes.
